name: get_manga_by_id
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool anime_manga_and_novels_api.
Tool description: Get the complete data of 14k Novels, 1k animes and 1k mangas.
we updated our data daily

API description: Fetches Manga information by its ID from the Anime, Manga, and Novels API.

is_id.description: The ID of the Manga to fetch information for.
